event.title: The 2nd International Perfume Fans Party!
event.description:
I’d like to welcome all the Perfume Fans from around the world with “OKONOMIYAKI”. Let me and Japanese Perfume fans know how much you love Perfume!

OKONOMIYAKI is thin and flat pancake cooked on a hot plate with bits of meat, seafood and chopped cabbages. It’s a special food of Hiroshima where they were born, raised and formed “Perfume” at the age of 11.

>>How to apply.. by 1/23

Please click the big red button with white Japanese word at the right side.
First you have to log-in with your twitter or google or flicker ID.
Then the applying form will be displayed. Please fill out the blanks. (last big blank is the free comment space to be displayed at this site. please say hi to everyone!) and click the big red button with white Japanese word at the bottom again. That’s all you have to do!

  • will be around 3,500-4,000YEN for each including drinks.

>>Any comments?

Please leave a comment form at the bottom and click small red button.

>>After this party…

I’m thinking about going out to a Karaoke bar to sing Perfume songs! (around 21:00-23:00)
We can practice how to reply to A-chan’s regular Japanese calling at the stage and how to wave your hands or jump to their songs. It would be fun :-)

*English is the official language of this party.

To Japanese Perfume fans

Perfume JPNツアーのために来日する志高きPerfumeファンを歓迎したいと思い企画しました。
あまり英語が話せなくてもPerfumeという共通ネタがあれば問題無。（サポートもできるだけします！）
thispenguin も来ます。

英語が苦手な方は、彼の送別会もご検討下さい☆日本語メインでやります。
See you next live! thispenguin送別会 (仮題）
2/2

thispenguinの日本滞在中の日程

thispenguinとは
http://yukonaka.blog47.fc2.com/blog-entry-318.html

ご質問があれば下のコメント欄からお願いします！

Yuko Nakamura
@yuko_nakamura
event.address: 東京都渋谷区宇田川町33-12
